body: Can we get a feature to make it so guilds can just disable downvotes on all of their posts? People who are worried about that allowing content to rise to the top of All could just block guilds that do that (and maybe even add an option to automatically block guilds who enable this feature). This will allow guilds who are the main targets of these brigades to be able to actually have content seen by others.
body_html: Can we get a feature to make it so guilds can just disable downvotes on all of their posts? People who are worried about that allowing content to rise to the top of All could just block guilds that do that (and maybe even add an option to automatically block guilds who enable this feature). This will allow guilds who are the main targets of these brigades to be able to actually have content seen by others.
title: A potential solution to stopping downvote brigades

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body:
If such an **opt-in** feature did exist, it should be for all voting, not just negative votes, otherwise it is unfair to the rest of the site. Negative feedback is just as important as positive feedback, perhaps even more so. 

You created an account specifically to create this post, so not sure of your guild, but ifs content is unpopular among the the general community, changing the settings to hide its posts from "All" can be very helpful in keeping unwanted users from seeing it.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

body: If upvotes were disabled too the posts would be a mess and never get on the front page. Even if downvotes are disabled, enough people still have to upvote it to get to that point.
body_html: If upvotes were disabled too the posts would be a mess and never get on the front page. Even if downvotes are disabled, enough people still have to upvote it to get to that point.

author.bio:
The world is a crazy, wonderful place to create any kind of experience you want.

Seems best tho, if you don't want to get hurt.. to listen to God, listen to your heart, and do what is right, always.
author.bio_html:
The world is a crazy, wonderful place to create any kind of experience you want.

body:
to be brigaded means you can't get your message out.

having a anti-brigade guild that supports those silenced is the only thing that makes sense.

help them get seen, exactly what a brigade is suppose to stop

if folks still don't care, it isn't a brigade.. it is that people here just don't like it.

i'd suggest you go someplace that you can have a circle jerk then

people don't agree with me all the time.

the earth is flat.. I get downvoted without comments.. if I was to say anything could be done..

**require people justify their downvote.  require people comment before they downvote.**

another thought.. require certain amount of 'rep' before you can downvote..

remove ability to create multiple shit accounts to some degree this way..

NEVER GIVE FREE UPVOTES TO FUCKERS ASKING FOR IT

crying for free upvotes just so folks can make a guild.. FUCKING EARN IT

if your comments don't get upvotes.. lurk more.. 

and SHUT THE FUCK UP .. until you have something to add.

folks think they don't use all their brain, and the ideal function is the entire brain is 'firing' all at once..

what you want is the relevant parts to work for you when they are needed and the rest need to SHUT THE FUCK UP so you can hear clearly from those involved or have something to add.
body_html:
to be brigaded means you can't get your message out.

having a anti-brigade guild that supports those silenced is the only thing that makes sense.

help them get seen, exactly what a brigade is suppose to stop

if folks still don't care, it isn't a brigade.. it is that people here just don't like it.

i'd suggest you go someplace that you can have a circle jerk then

people don't agree with me all the time.

the earth is flat.. I get downvoted without comments.. if I was to say anything could be done..

require people justify their downvote. require people comment before they downvote.

another thought.. require certain amount of 'rep' before you can downvote..

remove ability to create multiple shit accounts to some degree this way..

NEVER GIVE FREE UPVOTES TO FUCKERS ASKING FOR IT

crying for free upvotes just so folks can make a guild.. FUCKING EARN IT

if your comments don't get upvotes.. lurk more..

and SHUT THE FUCK UP .. until you have something to add.

folks think they don't use all their brain, and the ideal function is the entire brain is 'firing' all at once..

what you want is the relevant parts to work for you when they are needed and the rest need to SHUT THE FUCK UP so you can hear clearly from those involved or have something to add.
